description:
All adaptive layout component object types are derived from this object type.

Each component type must have a corresponding object type with an id of '_AdaptiveLayoutComponentType_' followed by a unique component type id (componentType). These object types defines the properties of the object that is passed to their associated implementation.

category.brief: The category for this layout component type
category.description: Represents the UI category to place this component in. Useful for selecting it from menus and any other visual representation that is helpful.
category.label: Category

componentType.brief: The Component Type id for this component type
componentType.description: Component type id is the object id for this Layout Component Type.
componentType.label: Component Type

brief.brief: Brief description of this component type
brief.description: Brief description of this component type.
brief.label: Brief

implementationId.brief: Implementation id for this component type
implementationId.description: Id associated with the implementation for this component type.
implementationId.label: Implementation Id

implementationParameters.description: This object is passed to the implementation.
implementationParameters.label: Implementation Parameters

instanceObjectType.brief: Object type id of the instance parameters object
instanceObjectType.description: Object type id of the instance parameters object.
instanceObjectType.label: Parameters Object Type

label.brief: Label to be used for this component type
label.description: Label to be used for this component type.
label.label: Label
